channel.title: INall
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INall, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 4 reasons why the Amex Gold is the 1 card we can’t live without
item.description: The Amex Gold is one of the best cards out there. Here's why so many points pros list it as the one card we can't live without.

item.title: OpenAI and Anthropic researchers decry ‘reckless’ safety culture at Elon Musk’s xAI
item.description: The criticisms follow weeks of scandals at xAI that have overshadowed the company's technological advances.

item.title: United Airlines just tweaked its profit outlook for the year. It’s still not enough for the stock.
item.description: The revision comes amid ‘less geopolitical and macroeconomic uncertainty,’ United says.

item.title: World of Hyatt Credit Card review: 1 of the most valuable hotel cards

item.title: Is Trump threatening to fire Jerome Powell just to bury the Jeffrey Epstein story? Sure looks like it.
item.description: Trump is a maestro at news management

item.title: Avelo Airlines axes 10 cities as it abandons the West Coast
item.description: Beleaguered Avelo Airlines will close its West Coast operation and exit 10 cities by December as it struggles financially.

item.title: Scale AI lays off 14% of staff, largely in data-labeling business
item.description: Scale AI is cutting 14% of the company just weeks after Meta invested $14.3 billion in the startup and hired away its CEO.

item.title: I’m 70, a widow and struggled financially. How do I let go of the resentment I feel towards my wealthy, unhelpful brother?
item.description: “I’m now doing better financially than I ever thought I would. My house in Tucson is valued at $416,000.”

item.title: My grandmother disinherited my father, yet made him executor of her will. Now he refuses to file for probate.
item.description: “When my grandfather died, my father went into their home and took financial information and jewelry.”

item.title: Watch Our Livestream Replay: Inside the AI Copyright Battles
item.description: Curious about generative AI and copyright? On July 16, our writers answered your questions about this critical topic.

item.title: Can US Measles Outbreaks Be Stopped?
item.description: The US almost lost its measles elimination status once. Lessons from that episode suggest it will be more difficult to avoid doing so now.

item.title: Marriott just rolled out its automatic room upgrade system — here's what that means for guests
item.description: Marriott's new automatic room upgrade system should improve the complimentary upgrade process for Gold Elite members and above.
